item.title: Raoul Moat and the Manhunt That Gripped a Nation
item.description: In 2010, Raoul Moat’s crimes led to a weeklong manhunt across the UK. This is the story of how it unfolded and came to an end.

media:content.media:title: Raoul Moat and the Manhunt That Gripped a Nation
media:content.media:description: In 2010, Raoul Moat’s crimes led to a weeklong manhunt across the UK. This is the story of how it unfolded and came to an end.

item.title: What Happened to Emily Ferlazzo?
item.description: In 2021, Emily Ferlazzo vanished during a holiday trip. This is the story of her disappearance, the investigation, and the tragedy that followed.

item.title: The Shocking Case of a Troubled Teen and the Dark Fate of His Family
item.description: When 18 year old Cesar Olalde was found alone in his family home, nobody expected that he would be the reason why his entire family had fallen silent.

item.title: When the Mind Takes a Dark Turn
item.description: Generro Sanchez’ death prompted an investigation into a man driven by a dangerous curiosity about violence.

item.title: The Wannabe Celebrity’s Dark Obsession
item.description: Sabrina Kouider’s actions in Wimbledon led to the death of Sophie Lionnet, drawing attention to the dangers of obsession and manipulation in a suburban setting.

item.title: The Case of Sharee and Jerry Miller
item.description: In 1999, Sharee Miller involved an online contact in a plot against her husband, highlighting early examples of criminal activity connected to the internet.

item.title: CCTV Captures Final Moments of Canny Ong
item.description: On 13 June 2003, Canny Ong spent a farewell dinner with family before returning to her car in the basement — her final moments captured on CCTV.

item.title: The Story of Hannah Cornelius
item.description: What began as a routine ride home for Hannah Cornelius ended in tragedy. The events of that night left lasting consequences and shocked the community.
